xml.brief: Add an image to a log entry

desc.p: Appends an image to an existing log entry.

req.name: log_uuid
req.p: ID of the log entry to which the image will be appended. The user of your Access Token must be the author of the log entry.

req.name: caption
req.p: Plain-text string, caption of the image. The caption usually will be displayed along with the image.

req.name: image_data
req.p: Binary data of the image; must be in JPEG, PNG or GIF format. There are limits on the file size and dimensions of uploaded images; you can query them via service/apiserv/installation.

opt.name: is_spoiler
opt.p: Set this to true to indicate that the submitted image contains hints for finding the geocache, i.e. it shows the stash. Spoiler images usually will not be shown to users by default, but replaced by a clickable placeholder or caption that leads to the image.

returns.p: A dictionary of the following structure:

ul.li: success - true, if the image was submitted successfully,
message - plain-text string, a message for the user, which acknowledges success or describes an error (usually you want to display this only when success is false),
image_uuid - ID of the newly created image, or null in case of an error.
